summary: After a young couple take in their two nieces, they suspect that a supernatural spirit named Mama has latched onto their family.
cast: Jessica Chastain|Nikolaj Coster-Waldau|Megan Charpentier|Isabelle Nélisse|Daniel Kash|Javier Botet|Jane Moffat|Morgan McGarry|David Fox|Dominic Cuzzocrea|Christopher Marren|Julia Chantrey|Ray Kahnert|Diane Gordon|Matthew Edison|Maya Dawe|Sierra Dawe|Nick Hall|Joey Proulx|Hannah Cheesman|Elva Mai Hoover|Pamela Farrauto|Chrys Hobbs|Laura Guiteras|Melina Matthews|Sydney Cross|Tyler Curnew|Jayden Greig|Kevin Kirkham
keywords: mother daughter relationship|supernatural horror|haunted house|cabin in the woods|ghost
title: Mamá
